# Getting Set Up

You need the latest versions of these R packages installed using `devtools`. 

* devtools::install_github('hypertidy/quadmesh')
* devtools::install_github('hypertidy/anglr')
* devtools::install_github('milesmcbain/r2vr')
* devtools::install_github('milesmcbain/r2vr.gis')

You also need an account on https://glitch.com if you have not registered one
already.
